alert.note: Alert for Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 20 at 3:59PM CST until November 20 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CST FOR CENTRAL PUSHMATAHA COUNTY... At 359 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Clayton Lake State Park, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Clayton Lake State Park... Nashoba... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tulsa.
